banner.subtitle: Established in 2001
banner.title: Welcome to Green Gold Seeds Pvt. Ltd.
banner.description: Green Gold Seeds Pvt. Ltd. (GGSPL), an Aurangabad-based Mulay Group company, focuses on research and development with high qualitative standards. With state-of-the-art facilities, updated technology, and an efficient team, we have expanded across 13 states including Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Gujarat, Rajasthan, West Bengal, and more. Today, GGSPL is emerging as one of the most trusted and fast-growing Indian seed companies, helping farmers improve yields and income.

about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: We Are Committed To Provide Quality Seeds
about.description: Green Gold Seeds Pvt. Ltd. is a leading seed company dedicated to providing high-quality seeds to farmers across India. With decades of experience in seed research and development, we focus on creating innovative hybrid varieties that improve crop yields and farmer livelihoods.
about.storyText1: Established in 2001, Green Gold Seeds Pvt. Ltd. (GGSPL) is an Aurangabad-based Mulay Group company focused on research and development with high qualitative standards. Over the last decade and a half, GGSPL has transformed the quality of seeds supplied to Indian farmers across the country.
about.storyText2: With state-of-the-art facilities, updated technology, and an efficient team, GGSPL has expanded across 10 states including Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Gujarat, Rajasthan, West Bengal, Assam, Odisha, Chhattisgarh, Karnataka, and Andhra Pradesh. Today, Green Gold Seeds is emerging as one of the most trusted and fastest growing Indian seed companies, helping farmers improve yields and income.

High-Performance Hybrids
For Indian Farming Success
products.freshVegetablesDesc: High-yielding Desi and American cotton hybrids developed and tested across multiple zones.
products.dairyProductDesc: Wheat and other field crop varieties bred for strong standability, grain quality and reliable returns.
products.livestockProductDesc: Oilseed and pulse seeds suited to diverse agro-climatic conditions and farmer practices.
products.organicFruitsDesc: Selected vegetable hybrids and varieties designed for better vigor, uniformity and marketable yield.

about.text: Believe that great food starts with great farming. For 40 years, our farm has been committed to sustainable, eco-friendly and full of goodness.

about.title: About Green Gold Seeds
about.description: Learn about our company, mission, and values.
about.storyText1: Established in 2001, Green Gold Seeds Pvt. Ltd. (GGSPL) is an Aurangabad-based Mulay Group company focused on research and development with high qualitative standards. Over the last decade and a half, GGSPL has transformed the quality of seeds supplied to Indian farmers across the country.
about.storyText2: With state-of-the-art facilities, updated technology, and an efficient team, GGSPL has expanded across 10 states including Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Gujarat, Rajasthan, West Bengal, Assam, Odisha, Chhattisgarh, Karnataka, and Andhra Pradesh. Today, Green Gold Seeds is emerging as one of the most trusted and fastest growing Indian seed companies, helping farmers improve yields and income.

about.missionText:
Highest level of Customer Satisfaction i.e. special Indian Seed Co. for Indian farmers.
(a) Better yield from seeds supplied by us
(b) By providing value added features in our products and
(c) By taking care of fitment of our products to farmer's needs, every time.
about.visionText: To be the leader amongst research oriented, customer focused Indian Seed Companies.

infrastructure.rdOverview: Green Gold Seeds Pvt. Ltd. has developed high-yielding hybrids in both Desi Cotton (G. arborium) and American Cotton (G. hirsutum).
infrastructure.rdGold70: Gold-70: Ranked within the top 5 entries consecutively for 4 years in AICCIP trials.
infrastructure.rdKuber: Kuber: Stood first in India in 2013 in AICCIP trials, which are coordinated by ICAR.
infrastructure.rdGold50: Gold-50: Tested in AICCIP for rainfed conditions and also ranked within the top 5 entries in various states of Central and South Zones.
infrastructure.rdNamaskar: Namaskar (Gold-81): A Desi cotton hybrid well-known among growers, it stood first for 3 consecutive years in the AICCIP trials.
infrastructure.rdPipeline: The company maintains a pipeline of other promising cotton hybrids in its research.
infrastructure.rdBollgard: Bollworm Resistant Cotton Hybrids (Bollgard II® Technology):
infrastructure.rdBollgardDesc: The company signed a sublicensee agreement with Mahyco Monsanto Biotech (I) Ltd for Bollgard II® technology. This led to the development of bollworm resistant cotton hybrids including: Kuber BGII, Ashoka & Kartik BGII, Vitthal BGII, Surya BGII, and Kavita BGII. These hybrids are selectively released for commercial cultivation in the North, Central, and South zones of India. They are recognized for their fiber quality, tolerance to sucking pests, and high yield potential under irrigated conditions.
infrastructure.rdWheatGold: Wheat Gold-21 and Gold-23: These are leading products in the market from GGSPL's research. They are popular for their quality parameters suitable for domestic use, minimal irrigation requirements, and high market value.
infrastructure.rdWheatOngoing: Ongoing research aims for further genetic improvement of wheat, focusing on physical and quality parameters, and yield potential. This research is conducted in collaboration with the University of Queensland. Additional research efforts are directed towards developing thermo-insensitive and drought-tolerant wheat varieties.
infrastructure.qcOverview: Quality control is an important part of Quality assurance which leads operational technique and activities that are used to satisfy Quality requirements. Green Gold Seeds are known by their quality. All the activities such as seed production and processing of seeds are done as per quality assurance norms through 1) Field inspection 2) Seed testing 3) Grow-out tests
infrastructure.qcFieldInspection: Field inspection of various crop is undertaken by technically trained personal by maintaining isolation distance, timely roughing, harvesting and threshing etc. to make available high quality seeds to the farming community at reasonable rate.
infrastructure.qcLaboratory: The GGSPL is having its own laboratory where seed testing in respect of moisture, physical purity, ODV and germination of seeds is being tested as per the ISTA rules. The seed testing laboratory have been participated in inter-laboratory seed testing program with Govt. seed testing laboratory parbhani from 2013-14.
infrastructure.qcGrowOut: Quality control wing also conducting grow-out test for all the crop irrespective of stages of seed to assess the genetic purity of every cultivar. Field staff working in quality control squad undertake periodical visits of seed processing plant and seed storage godown and suggest corrective steps if necessary to ensure the quality of seed.
infrastructure.spOverview: Seed from fields meeting prescribed standards is brought to a processing plant after harvesting. Seed processing is essential to: 1) Dry seeds to a safe moisture level. 2) Remove or reduce undesirable materials such as weed seed, damaged seed, and other crop seeds. 3) Ensure uniform size grading. 4) Perform seed treatment to upgrade overall seed quality.
infrastructure.spDefinition: Seed processing is defined as all steps necessary for the preparation of harvested seed for marketing, specifically: handling, drying, shelling, cleaning, size grading, treating, and packaging.
infrastructure.spLocations: Processing Plant Locations: The main processing plant is located at Narayanpur shivar waluj, Dist. Aurangabad. Additional contract processing plants are located at Chikhali (Buldhana) and Shrirampur (A'Nagar) in Maharashtra. Ginning and delinting of cotton are done at Bodeli and Idar in Gujarat state.

about.rAndDDesc: Genetic research and hybrid development led by the Plant Biotechnology Research Center.
about.productionDesc: Seed multiplication and large-scale production adhering to strict agronomic protocols.
about.qualityControlDesc: Multi-stage lab and field testing to guarantee purity, vigor, and farmer-ready performance.
about.processingDesc: State-of-the-art conditioning ensures clean, graded, and well-packed seed lots.
about.marketingDesc: Closer farmer engagement, timely availability, and trusted advisory support.
about.closingStatement: A company with excellence and earnestly dedicated to agriculture farming.

services.diagnosticsTestDescription: Comprehensive crop and soil diagnostics to improve yield quality.

diagnosticsTest.title: Diagnostic Test
diagnosticsTest.parentalLinePurity: Parental line purity analysis using Molecular markers
diagnosticsTest.customizedScreening: Customized screening of germplasm for selective traits
diagnosticsTest.molecularMarkerAssistance: Assistance in molecular marker assisted breeding
diagnosticsTest.description1: The success of a seed company is directly linked to consistent quality. The Quality Assurance Department is the backbone of the seed business, ensuring excellence at every stage from production to delivery.
diagnosticsTest.description2: Our Quality Assurance Department operates at two levels: farm-level monitoring to ensure genetic purity during seed production, and our Seed Testing Laboratory that verifies physical purity, germination, viability/vigour, seed health, and numerous qualitative parameters. We strictly adhere to Indian Minimum Seed Certification Standards and ISTA norms, releasing seeds for marketing only after they pass all stringent testing parameters.
diagnosticsTest.point1: Farm-level genetic purity monitoring during seed production
diagnosticsTest.point2: Comprehensive testing: Physical purity, germination, viability, and seed health
diagnosticsTest.point3: ISTA-certified laboratory with ultra-modern equipment and trained personnel
diagnosticsTest.point4: End-to-end quality control from processing to farmer delivery and field performance
diagnosticsTest.farmLevelMonitoringDesc: Our Quality Assurance team monitors seed production at farm level to ensure genetic purity and quality standards throughout the process.
diagnosticsTest.modernTestingLaboratoryDesc: Our ultra-modern Seed Testing Laboratory with advanced equipment and trained personnel ensures reliable, ISTA-certified results.
diagnosticsTest.gmoTesting: GMO testing for presence of genetic materials (End point PCR method)
diagnosticsTest.hybridPurity: Determination of hybrid purity (Molecular GOT / M-GOT)
diagnosticsTest.parentalLinePurity: Parental line purity analysis using Molecular markers
diagnosticsTest.screeningTomatoTY: Screening of Tomato for Tomato Yellow Leaf curl virus (TY) using molecular markers
diagnosticsTest.customizedScreening: Customized screening of germplasm for selective traits
diagnosticsTest.molecularMarkerAssistance: Assistance in molecular marker assisted breeding
diagnosticsTest.qualitativeElisaKitCry1Ac: Qualitative ELISA kit for Cry1Ac (05 plates)
diagnosticsTest.qualitativeElisaKitCry2Ab: Qualitative ELISA kit for Cry2Ab (05 plates)
diagnosticsTest.qualitativeElisaKitCry1AcCry2Ab: Qualitative ELISA kit for Cry1Ac/Cry2Ab (05 plates)
diagnosticsTest.lateralFlowCry1Ac: Lateral Flow strip for detection of Cry1Ac (50 Strips)
diagnosticsTest.lateralFlowCry2Ab: Lateral Flow strip for detection of Cry2Ab (50 Strips)
diagnosticsTest.lateralFlowCP4EPSPS: Lateral Flow strip for detection of CP4EPSPS (50 Strips)

doDonts.title:
Practical Guidelines
for Better Yield
And Stronger Farms
doDonts.intro: Green Gold Seeds works with Indian farmers to deliver reliable, high-yielding hybrids. Follow these simple do’s and don’ts to make the most of every acre you cultivate.
doDonts.do3: Rotate crops regularly to maintain soil health
doDonts.do4: Adopt recommended and sustainable farming practices
doDonts.do5: Choose quality-certified seed for every season
doDonts.dont3: Don’t ignore soil testing before sowing
doDonts.dont4: Don’t compromise on seed or input quality
doDonts.dont5: Don’t use unsafe or harmful packaging and storage

faq.contactTitle: Need help with our seeds or services?
faq.contactText: Have questions about Green Gold Seeds products, diagnostics, or distribution? Our team is ready to guide you with the right hybrid choice and agronomy support.
faq.title:
We’ve Got The Answers
You Need.
faq.q1: What crops do Green Gold Seeds offer?
faq.a1: We provide high-performing hybrids and varieties in cotton, wheat, maize, pulses and oilseeds tailored to different agro-climatic zones.
faq.q2: Where can I buy Green Gold Seeds products?
faq.a2: Our seeds are available through authorized dealers and distributors across India. You can also contact us directly for dealer details in your area.
faq.q3: Do you provide agronomy or field support?
faq.a3: Yes, our field team advises farmers on sowing, nutrition, crop protection and best agronomic practices for each hybrid.
faq.q4: Are your seeds tested for quality?
faq.a4: Every seed lot goes through stringent field, laboratory and grow-out tests to ensure genetic purity and strong germination before packing.
faq.q5: How can I contact Green Gold Seeds?
faq.a5: You can reach us at +91 88888 66031 or email us at greengoldseeds@rediffmail.com for product or technical support.

testimonials.title:
What Farmers & Partners
Say About Us
testimonials.t1Text: Green Gold Seeds hybrids have given us consistent yields and better returns, even in challenging seasons. Their quality and field support build confidence year after year.
testimonials.t2Text: Our farmers trust Green Gold Seeds for timely supply and strong-performing hybrids. The company stands firmly behind its products in the field.
testimonials.t3Text: Working with Green Gold Seeds has been smooth and professional. Their focus on quality at every stage reflects in the performance of seeds at farmer level.
testimonials.t4Text: Green Gold cotton hybrids have helped us achieve good boll setting and fibre quality. The brand has become a preferred choice in our village.
testimonials.t5Text: Green Gold wheat varieties have given us bold grains and stable yields with limited irrigation. It has improved our profitability over the years.
testimonials.t6Text: Green Gold Seeds is responsive to market needs and farmer feedback. Their product range and support help us grow our business responsibly.

productDetails.description: The power to be found between the pages of a book is formidable, indeed. And these 80 inspiring quotes about books and importance of reading are here to remind you of that. From beloved bestsellers to iconic celebrities, these quotes exemplify the benefits of reading and of a good books to comfort, challenge, and inspire you.
